inclusion.criterion: weeks or later, weighing at least 2,500 grams, and with no reported congenital anomalies.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No congenital abnormalities noted on birth record
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Delivery in Maine at 36 weeks or later
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: TSH levels outside normal range in second trimester
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and was diagnosed with high TSH level (13 mU/L) and low free T4 level (0.2 ng/dl). However, after starting Levothyroxine per day, her symptoms improved significantly and her periods are normal.
